channel.title: Double Deux - James Lucien & Kerfuffle
channel.description:
https://m.soundcloud.com/james-lucien-official/double-deux
This song is sort of a remix/remastering of one of my first songs using Auxy. I never put it on SC because it wasn't that good and I didn't have one at the time. It's my second collab with @Kerfuffle and he did such a fantastic job helping me rework the song into something much more amazing.
((BTW if anyone wants to help me genre-classify the song gets brownie points! ^w^))

item.title: Double Deux - James Lucien & Kerfuffle
item.dc:creator: Kerfuffle
item.description:
It was my pleasure JFalc! It’s always fun working with you!

Everybody should take a real close look at his theory, it’s actually nuts! I’m always baffled at how he comes up with the most insane progressions and keys.

This track I hardly wanted to touch his piano, so I took the subtle approach to filling in around it. It turned out fantastic and I couldn’t be happier with the outcome of his dissonance being brought forth and the taking it’s role as the key element.

This isn’t the last collab between us, that’s for sure.

Read full topic
